message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $15000.  I believe it's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $8000 for it. I hope this revised offer works for you.

Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your budget, $8000 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $11000.  This still gives you a great deal, and it's closer to what I need to make this work. Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $9500 for your product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle.
